SQL.LOAD: SELECT comm_p_code_id, payee_type_id, entity_id, is_comm_fixed_id, commission_amount, markup_amount, created_by, modified_by, created_date, modified_date, comm_p_code_entity_id, comm_schedule_id, number_of_days_clawback, branch_id FROM elp_comm_p_code_entity WHERE comm_p_code_entity_id = :comm_p_code_entity_id
SQL.FIND: SELECT Count(*) As entityRecords FROM elp_comm_p_code_entity WHERE comm_p_code_entity_id = :comm_p_code_entity_id
SQL.LOAD_BY_PERIOD_ID: SELECT comm_p_code_entity_id, comm_p_code_id, payee_type_id, entity_id, is_comm_fixed_id, commission_amount, markup_amount, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, comm_schedule_id, number_of_days_clawback, branch_id FROM elp_comm_p_code_entity WHERE comm_p_code_id = :comm_p_code_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT pce.comm_p_code_entity_id, pce.comm_p_code_id, lipy.list_item_id payee_type_id, transpy.translation payee_type, nvl(ce.entity_id, '') entity_id, nvl(ce.entity_name, '') entity, licf.list_item_id is_comm_fixed_id, licf.code is_comm_fixed_code, transcf.translation is_comm_fixed, pce.commission_amount, pce.markup_amount, pce.comm_schedule_id, pce.number_of_days_clawback, pce.branch_id FROM elp_comm_p_code_entity pce, elp_commission_entity ce, elp_list_item lipy, elp_dict_item_translation transpy, elp_list_item licf, elp_dict_item_translation transcf WHERE pce.comm_p_code_id = :comm_p_code_id AND ce.entity_id(+) = pce.entity_id AND lipy.list_item_id = pce.payee_type_id AND transpy.dict_item_id = lipy.dict_item_id AND transpy.language_id = :language_id AND licf.list_item_id = pce.is_comm_fixed_id AND transcf.dict_item_id = licf.dict_item_id AND transcf.language_id = :language_id
SQL.LOAD_ENTITIES: SELECT comm_p_code_id, payee_type_id, entity_id, is_comm_fixed_id, commission_amount, markup_amount, created_by, modified_by, created_date, modified_date, comm_p_code_entity_id, comm_schedule_id, number_of_days_clawback, branch_id FROM elp_comm_p_code_entity pce WHERE pce.comm_p_code_id = :comm_p_code_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_comm_p_code_entity SET comm_p_code_id = :comm_p_code_id, payee_type_id = :payee_type_id, entity_id = :entity_id, is_comm_fixed_id = :is_comm_fixed_id, commission_amount = :commission_amount, markup_amount = :markup_amount, modified_by = :modified_by, comm_schedule_id = :comm_schedule_id, number_of_days_clawback=:number_of_days_clawback, branch_id=:branch_id WHERE comm_p_code_entity_id = :comm_p_code_entity_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_comm_p_code_entity ( comm_p_code_id, payee_type_id, entity_id, is_comm_fixed_id, commission_amount, markup_amount, created_by, comm_p_code_entity_id, comm_schedule_id, number_of_days_clawback, branch_id ) VALUES ( :comm_p_code_id, :payee_type_id, :entity_id, :is_comm_fixed_id, :commission_amount, :markup_amount, :created_by, :comm_p_code_entity_id, :comm_schedule_id, :number_of_days_clawback, :branch_id )
